{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Asante |model=FR3002AL |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B00006BA6K |price=330 |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/29/2000 |manuf_country= |manuf=AMIT |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PD5LMWP100 |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=AMD |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit),Parallel |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Asante FriendlyNET AL1011 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Harris |wi1_chip1_model=HFA3841 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3861B |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8019AS |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8019AS |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.123.254 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth=00:00:94 |default_ch= }} ''FriendlyNET FR3002AL Wireless Router''
[http://web.archive.bibalex.org/web/20040625004224/www.asante.com/support/downProd.aspx?id=FR3002AL Support page (via archive.org)]
[http://web.archive.bibalex.org/web/20041209151342/www.asante.com/downloads/FR3002AL_2-5_RN.pdf Release notes for the latest FW (2.5) (via archive.org)] :The release notes list the only compatible card's P/N as 99-00652-07 ([http://www.asante.com/support/legacy/Adapters_in/FriendlyNetAeroLAN.asp AL1011 Rev. A)]). [http://www.asante.com/downloads/legacy/userManuals/FR3004_UM.pdf User Manual for the FR300x series] :[http://www.asante.com/downloads/legacy/userManuals/FR3002AL_Addendum_UM.pdf Addendum to the User Manual] Per the user manual, there are FR3002AL-1PCM and FR3002AL-2PCM models. Both include the card. It is not readily apparent what the difference was between units (if any). [http://www.celiamania.com/xoops/modules/newbb/viewtopic.php?viewmode=compact&order=ASC&topic_id=41&forum=1&menumode=2 Limited board views are available on celiamania] [http://www.practicallynetworked.com/item.asp?pid=397 On Practically Networked] :[http://www.practicallynetworked.com/review.asp?pid=397 Reviewed by Tim Higgins] :The card used pictured appears to be a '''Gemtek''' card. ('''Intersil''' based) [http://www.tweak3d.net/reviews/asante/fr3002al/2.shtml Reviewed on tweak3d.net] :The default SSID appears to be '''default'''. :The card in this review appears to be a '''Delta Networks''' card. ('''Intersil''' based) This device has a 10Mbit port for the WAN and 2 10/100 ports for the switch. The FCC ID of the wireless module has been assigned to this device.
